pages.text: Power Item is an important resource used in $(l:overview/multiblocks_altar)altar crafting$(). It is dropped by $(l:overview/world_spawn#fairy)Maid Fairy$() or $(l:overview/world_spawn#rinnosuke)Rinnosuke Morichika$().

When you hold the $(l:overview/gohei_and_danmaku)Gohei$(), you can see your Power at the top-left of the game screen. $(br2)The maximum Power is 5, and collecting more Power Item after this point will have no effect.
